summary: Advanced Air Mobility is an emerging aviation concept that will use new types of aircraft and technology, such as electric aircraft that can take off and land vertically. Before new aircraft can be used, the FAA needs to certify the designs and regulate how they are operated. title: Advanced Air Mobility: Legal Authorities and Issues to Consider for Operations
